data.description: SAX filter for sorting elements in XML
data.communities: Discussed on perl-xml list. Source in CVS on SourceForge
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a SAX Filter module which sorts data in XML documents.
    XML::Filter is the accepted namespace for SAX filters. So
    XML::Filter::Sort seems a natural choice of name. No opposition or
    alternative suggestions came to light on the mailing list.
